head.citation-title: 15th IFIP TC8 International Conference on Computer Information Systems and Industrial Management, CISIM 2016
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 64 papers. The special focus in this conference is on Rough Set Methods for Big Data Analytics, Images, Visualization, Classification, Optimization, Tuning, Scheduling in Manufacturing, Other Applications and Algorithms. The topics include: Complex adaptive systems and interactive granular computing; innovation and big data; attribute reduction based on mapreduce modeland discernibility measure; mapping points back from the concept space with minimum mean squared error; detection of orbital floor fractures by principal component analysis; an approach to cell nuclei counting in histological image analysis; skull stripping for MRI images using morphological operators; optimization of chosen transport task by using generic algorithms; simulations for tuning a laser power control system of the cladding process; automated application of inventory optimization; techniques of Czech language lossless text compression; multi-machine scheduling with setup times; cyber security of the application layer of mission critical industrial systems; an evolutionary approach to cyclic real world scheduling; graph clustering using early-stopped random walks; methods of synthesis of controlled random tests; mutual information for quaternion time series; fuzzy random forest with C-fuzzy decision trees; PLACE_SUBST transformation of P/T Petri process nets and its properties; harmony search for data mining with big data; an electronic document for distributed electronic services; towards generating a unique signature for remote user by keystrokes dynamics; music emotion maps in arousal-valence space and synthesis of high-speed finite state machines in FPGAs by state splitting.
